overview: Beautiful Cherie had it all - a gorgeous house, a new, loving husband, and zero responsibilities, until stepdaughter Karlee returns from boarding school. Suddenly everything falls apart and Cherie finds herself in jail facing a murder charge after finding her husband dead. Secretive, seductive Karlee knows the truth, but will she come to bat for her stepmom, or is this an all amusing game to her?
title: Lesbian Stepmother 2
